name: Firelog
description: This app collects your indoor temperature and outdoor temperature for you to track and monitor, because Nest doesn't store more than a week of data.

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:setup db:migrate temps

NEST_EMAIL.description: The email address for your Nest account.

NEST_PASS.description: The password for your Nest account

POSTCODE.description: Your postcode/zipcode (used to get the outdoor temp from Nest's service).
